me.recsfor.app

Class CredentialEncryption

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.recsfor.app.CredentialEncryption

  • public class CredentialEncryption
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to encrypt a user's credentials (their password), so it can be securely stored in a database.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String hash 
      private static java.lang.String HASH_ALGO 
      private static int ITERATIONS 
      private java.lang.String pass 
      private java.lang.String salt 
      private static java.lang.String SALT_ALGO 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CredentialEncryption() 
      CredentialEncryption(java.lang.String pass)
      Constructor to create a hash for the provided password using a newly generated salt.
      CredentialEncryption(java.lang.String pass, java.lang.String salt)
      Constructor to create a hash for the provided password using a previously generated salt.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.lang.String generateHash()
      Creates a 256-bit (64 character) hash using password-based encryption.
      private java.lang.String generateSalt()
      Creates a random 128-bit (32 character) salt to use for hashing.
      java.lang.String getHash() 
      java.lang.String getSalt() 
      void setHash(java.lang.String hash) 
      void setSalt(java.lang.String salt) 
      boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String storedHash)
      Instance method to determine whether a password matches its stored hash, using the generated salt for the user.

      • validatePassword

        public boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String storedHash)
                         throws org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException
        Instance method to determine whether a password matches its stored hash, using the generated salt for the user.
        Parameters:
        storedHash - the known correct password hash
        Returns:
        whether or not the password is correct
        Throws:
        org.apache.commons.codec.DecoderException - if the a hash can not be converted from hexadecimal
